name: Cursed Sands Server Mod
changeNote:
1.1.0
- Change: Added Yasmina to the Black Hand and Dogs of the Desert spawn table
- Change: Reverted Obsidian Spear changes to fall in line with funcom balancing
- Change: Serpent-man War Spears and The Staff of Epemitreus now ~actually~ have reach
- Change: Increased Black Dragon Pike's Armor Pen to 0.0765
- Change: Reduced Vaulting Pole Armor Pen to 0.0765
- Change: Increased damage of Exceptional Acheronian Spear to 47
- Change: Reverted Dragonbone Spear Armor Pen to vanilla values
- Change: Reduced Vaulting Pole Armor Pen to 0.0765
- Change: Increased Bonus Strength on the Lodestone Warhammer to +5
- Change: Increased Stamina cost for the Lying Bastard Sword
- Change: Yasmina no longer crafts Flawless Marauder Armor
- Change: Marauder Armorer's no longer craft Exceptional Marauder Armor
- Removed: Marauder Feats and Recipes since they are now redundant with fashionist
- Removed: Marauder Armorer's from the spawn table
- Removed: Enchantments of the Silent Legion feat/recipe since it is now redundant with fashionist
- Removed: Scroll (Enchantments of the Silent Legion) from the dark library
- New: Added 23 new dyes, admin spawn only
- New: Added 5 dyes from the ISE mod (thanks Shendelzare!)
- New: Explorer Bedroll which ignores land claim
- New: Tavern Pillows, four pillows that work like normal bedrolls
- New: Helmets of Fashion feat, three craftable invisible helmets that can be used to hide your helmet slot via fashionist
author: Gooseacat
